vote.title: Authorize an amendment (Supplemental Agreement No. 6) to Resolution No. 23-1661, previously approved on December 13, 2023 to reduce the contract in the amount of $37,992.43 with the Bridge Steps for the management and all operational responsibility of the City’s homeless shelter facility for FY 2023-2024 for the Office of Homeless Solutions - Not to exceed ($37,922.43), from $11,093,700.00 to $11,055,777.57 - Financing: FY 2022 TDHCA-Homeless Housing and Services Program Reallocation Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize an amendment (Supplemental Agreement No. 6) to Resolution No. 23-1661, previously approved on December 13, 2023 to reduce the contract in the amount of $37,992.43 with the Bridge Steps for the management and all operational responsibility of the City’s homeless shelter facility for FY 2023-2024 for the Office of Homeless Solutions - Not to exceed ($37,922.43), from $11,093,700.00 to $11,055,777.57 - Financing: FY 2022 TDHCA-Homeless Housing and Services Program Reallocation Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
